Ed Chao
UX + UI Designer

Summary

My name is Ed Chao and I am a Designer. I currently work at a company called Quark Games as the Creative Director & UX Lead. In my time there, I've helped create apps that have been front-page featured by Apple and written about by the likes of Polygon, IGN, and Kotaku. When I'm not doing that I like to sketch and make things that I would like to use. Usually that means designing and/or coding up tiny projects that center around delightful user experiences (you can see some of them in my works section). Other than that, I enjoy making cappucinos for my lovely wife and chasing down my devious dog.

Experience

  • 12-... Creative Director @ Quarkgames
  • 09-12 Art + UX Lead @ PlayMesh
  • 09-10 Designer in Residence @ SRI
  • 07-11 Designer Founder @ Legitimate Hero Co.

My Day to Day

  • Product Design
  • UX Storyboarding
  • UI Design
  • UI Art (i.e. Graphically thematic treatment of UI elements)
  • User Testing
